example.code:
PS C:\>$n = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.InstanceNetworkInterfaceSpecification PS C:\>$n.AssociatePublicIpAddress = $true PS C:\>$n.DeleteOnTermination = $true PS C:\>$n.Description = "MY-VPC1" PS C:\>$n.DeviceIndex = 0 PS C:\>$n.Groups.Add("sg-a1b2c3d4") PS C:\>$n.PrivateIpAddress = "10.0.0.1" PS C:\>$n.SubnetId = "subnet-a1b2c3d4"
PS C:\>Request-EC2SpotInstance ` -InstanceCount 1 ` -LaunchSpecification_EbsOptimized $false ` -LaunchSpecification_ImageId ami-123456 ` -LaunchSpecification_InstanceType m1.small ` -LaunchSpecification_MonitoringEnabled $true ` -Placement_AvailabilityZone us-west-2b ` -SpotPrice 5 ` -Type one-time ` -LaunchSpecification_NetworkInterfaces $n
example.description: Requests a m1.small Amazon EC2 Spot Instance in the private subnet specified by subnet-a1b2c3d4 with monitoring enabled and placed into a specific availability zone. Note that the security group, sg-a1b2c3d4, must be created in the VPC that contains the specified subnet, subnet-a1b2c3d4

example.code:
PS C:\>$interface1 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.InstanceNetworkInterfaceSpecification PS C:\>$interface1.PrivateIpAddress = "10.0.1.5" PS C:\>$interface1.SubnetId = "subnet-a1b2c3d4" PS C:\>$interface1.DeviceIndex = 0 PS C:\>$interface1.Groups.Add("sg-a1b2c3d4")
PS C:\>Request-EC2SpotInstance -SpotPrice 0.007 -InstanceCount 2 -Type one-time -LaunchSpecification_ImageId ami-12345678 -LaunchSpecification_InstanceType m1.small -LaunchSpecification_NetworkInterface $interface1
example.description: Requests two t1.small Amazon EC2 Spot Instances in the private subnet specified by subnet-a1b2c3d4. Note that the security group, sg-a1b2c3d4, must be created in the VPC that contains the specified subnet, subnet-a1b2c3d4.
